critique: The document is an executive order focused on water pollution control from federal activities. It emphasizes prevention, control, and abatement of water pollution from Federal Government activities in the United States. It directs federal agencies to take steps to control pollution from existing and new facilities, and to reduce pollution from other operations such as water resources projects. It also emphasizes cooperation with the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare and with State and interstate agencies and municipalities. The order sets general standards for waste treatment and encourages the development of areawide sewer systems. It also calls for a study of water pollution from vessel operations.
